snippet: The international community is failing to address Afghanistan’s worsening refugee crisis....
abstract: Editorial calls on international community to grant request from United for $181 million to address immediate needs of tens of thousands of Afghans who have been internally displaced as Taliban and government security forces continue to battle; warns against lack of planning to address pending humanitarian disaster, citing predictions that more than 1.5 million vulnerable Afghans could be returning to their homes by end of year.
lead_paragraph: The international community is failing to address Afghanistan’s worsening refugee crisis.
